AUTH_ERROR_TIP_2: Make sure your phone and computer are on the same Wi-Fi network.
SAFARI: Safari users: Change your cookie settings to let SnapPea work.
SAFARI_CONTENT: Go to Settings > Privacy > Block cookies and select "Never".
H1: Manage your Android phone from the web.
H1_P: Your photos, messages, contacts and apps in your web browser.
H2_P: To get started, install SnapPea on your phone. It's free.
KEEPER: Sending passcode. If you reload now, sign in will be canceled.
UNSUPPORTED_H1_P: Sorry, SnapPea doesn't support your browser. We strongly recommend that you use Chrome.

CONNECT_DEVICE_FAILED_POP.title: Connection failed
CONNECT_DEVICE_FAILED_POP.content: Confirm that SnapPea is running on your phone.

ANNOUNCEMENT: Heya SnapPea user:  Version 1.5 is here! Sign in is now faster and more secure with your Google account.

ADD_NEW_PHONE_TIPS.STEP2: 2. Open SnapPea and sign in with $$$$
ADD_NEW_PHONE_TIPS.STEP3: After you finish, your phone will appear here.

NO_DEVICES.step1: SnapPea is running on your phone. I haven't installed SnapPea yet.
NO_DEVICES.step2: You're signed in with this account
NO_DEVICES.step3: Your phone is connected to Wi-Fi.

USER_GUIDE.PAGE1_H2: The Android app is required to get started.
USER_GUIDE.PAGE2_H2: After you sign in, your phone will appear here.
USER_GUIDE.PAGE1_WAY2: Use your phone to scan the QR code.
USER_GUIDE.PAGE2_WAY1: Use $$$$ to sign in. Your phone will appear here.

WAP_CONNECTION_ALERT.TITLE: Will use mobile data
WAP_CONNECTION_ALERT.CONTENT: Using MobileConnect may cost you money depending upon your data plan.

UPDATE_SDK_TIP: Rejoice, your connection has been upgraded! SnapPea can now connect when your phone is on a different Wi-Fi network and on mobile data (3G, 4G).Because this is a major update, it's necessary to update to the latest version of the SnapPea mobile app to connect.
GOOGLE_PLAY: Get the update on Google Play
